# wcp-icon

Shows an icon from the css.gg icon set.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type     |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| `name`   | `name`    | `string` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property          | Description                                      |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--wcp-icon-size` | Sets the size of the icon as unitless number in pixels |
